amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to reduce Bureau of Land Management funding by 50%.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce Bureau of Land Management funding by 50%.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 280 (Roll no. 567).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 280 (Roll no. 567).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
